title: Roscoe Wallace, Steve Sings, Rich with Broke Family, MITS, Dos and Donts Sidepiece, Santa Schedule, Christmas Arguments, Listening, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Roscoe Wallace, Steve Sings, Rich with Broke Family, MITS, Dos and Donts Sidepiece, Santa Schedule, Christmas Arguments, Listening, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Roscoe Wallace sings Christmas carols. Uncle Steve joins in the singing. We ask The CEO about being rich with broke family and friends. Fool #2 in the streets singing with the people. Fool #1 talks about the do's and don'ts of sidepiece behavior during the Christmas season. Steve knows Santa so well that he tells us about his (Santa's) schedule. According to a survey, couples argue during the Christmas season. We have the exact number of times that they argue as well. How good of a listener are you? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the value of dreams and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
